DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess bioequivalence Zoloft ODT 50 mg without water Japanese commercial oral tablet JZoloft 50 mg fast condition water Healthy Japanese Subjects
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Of Zoloft ODT To Jzoloft In Healthy Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese subject age 20 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Significant psychiatric disorder , recurrent episode severe depression , subject serious suicidal risk per criterion . Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method nonhormonal contraception outline protocol least 14 day prior first dose study medication 28 day last dose study medication .
